name: Ball Pit (Alzhar)
description:
This is a local player party game called ball pit.  Both players play as a ball in a toy environment.  The game is a best 3 out of 5 fighting game.  

There are 4 levels showing.  The jacks damage the player, the lego walls can be destroyed and bandaids heal.  

This has been designed for both players to play on a single keyboard.  

WASD and Arrow keys for movement

Space and Numpad 0 for jump

E and Numpad enter for charging/slam

More was planned, but due to circumstances I will be dropping this.
